statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_count > 5;
SELECT product_id, defect_count FROM quality_control_data WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, defect_count, production_date FROM quality_control_data WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_count < 3 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT id, production_date FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_count = 0 LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_count > 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, production_date FROM quality_control_data WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT id, defect_count, product_id FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_count = 0 OR product_id = 3 ORDER BY defect_count ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01' AND defect_count >= 5 ORDER BY production_date ASC, defect_count DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(defect_count) AS avg_defects FROM quality_control_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(defect_count) > 5 ORDER BY avg_defects DESC;
SELECT * FROM defects;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Scratch';
SELECT defect_id, defect_description FROM defects ORDER BY defect_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE defect_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY inspection_id ASC;
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_id, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspector_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Electrical' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM defects WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-30';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_id, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE defect_status = 'Open' AND inspection_result = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM defects JOIN inspections ON defects.defect_id = inspections.defect_id WHERE inspector_id = 123 ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM defects JOIN inspections ON defects.defect_id = inspections.defect_id GROUP BY defect_id HAVING total_inspections > 5;
SELECT * FROM product_details;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_name, defect_count FROM statistical_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(defect_rate) AS avg_defect_rate FROM quality_control_data;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM quality_control_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT id, product_name, defect_rate FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT AVG(defect_rate) AS average_defect_rate FROM quality_control_data;
SELECT product_name, defect_rate FROM quality_control_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM statistical_analysis WHERE defect_count > 100 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM defects ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT defect_name, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_severity = 2;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT defect_percentage, report_date FROM defect_rates ORDER BY defect_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT defect_name, defect_type, defect_severity FROM defects WHERE defect_severity > 1 ORDER BY defect_name ASC;

SELECT inspections.id, product_name, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections INNER JOIN products ON inspections.product_id = products.id WHERE defect_id IS NULL ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT product_id, AVG(defect_percentage) AS avg_defect_percentage FROM defect_rates WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(defect_percentage) > 10 ORDER BY avg_defect_percentage DESC;

SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS num_defects FROM products INNER JOIN inspections ON products.id = inspections.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING num_defects > 2 ORDER BY num_defects DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM defects ORDER BY defect_date DESC;
SELECT defect_description, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM products WHERE defect_id IS NULL;
SELECT operator_name, operator_role FROM operators;
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_value, measurement_date FROM measurements ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Mechanical'
SELECT defect_description, defect_date FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Electrical' ORDER BY defect_date DESC
SELECT product_name, production_date, defect_date FROM products INNER JOIN defects ON products.defect_id = defects.defect_id
SELECT measurement_value, measurement_date FROM measurements WHERE measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC
SELECT operator_name, operator_role FROM operators
